name: Exist
description: You exist. That's a good start. Now you can upgrade your connections to your host's brain to access information about their senses.

name: Smell I
description: Allows you to know if a smell is strong or not.

name: Smell II
description: Allows you to know if a smell is attractive or repulsive.

name: Smell III
description: Allows you to know if your host smells a danger.

name: Vision I
description: Allows you to know about the size of a shape.

name: Vision II
description: Allows you to know if your host finds what they see familiar.

name: Vision III
description: Allows you to have a short description of the object being seen.

name: Hearing I
description: Allows you to hear loud sounds.

name: Hearing II
description: Allows you to recognize sounds your host finds familiar.

name: Hearing III
description: Allows you to have a short description of the sound.

name: Feelings Perception I
description: Allows you to know if your host is scared.

name: Feelings Perception II
description: Allows you to know if your host is attracted towards something.

name: Feelings Perception III
description: Allows you to know if your host is excited.

name: Physical Needs I
description: Allows you to know if your host is hungry.

name: Physical Needs II
description: Allows you to know if your host needs to use their restroom.

name: Physical Needs III
description: Allows you to know if you're horny or bored.
